content: this pattern is one of many designs published by scheepjes in their yarn - the after party booklets released with a new design every 2 weeks also available in print from scheepjes stockists **yarn requirements** scheepjes catona 100% mercerised cotton 50g/125m yarn a 130 old lace x 1 ball scheepjes catona 100% mercerised cotton 25g/62 5m yarn b 383 ginger gold x 1 ball yarn c 409 soft rose x 1 ball yarn d 414 vintage peach x 1 ball yarn e 522 primrose x 1 ball yarn f 392 lime juice x 1 ball yarn g 385 crystalline x 1 ball leftover black yarn 2 5mm crochet hook stitch marker polyester stuffing wobble ball 110mm item no 6556-009 piece of elastic or string to fit around wobble ball **sizing in cm** 100 x 150cm / 39 5 x 59in **gauge** 12 sts and 14 row to measure 5 x 5cm over double_crochet using a 2 5mm hook this crochet pattern contains a written pattern the pattern is available as a digital download in dutch german french spanish and english uk and us terms the pattern is also available as a hardcopy booklet in dutch uk english and german available from scheepjes retailers
